page.title: 09PLAYGROUND GAMES 2
page.content: {Creep Mouse}is a game for 5 - 6 players.What you have to do is one person is ON and the rest have to line up about 20 feet away. Then the one who is ON turns his/her back on the rest and they have to try and creep up to him. But the one who is ON turns around and if he/she sees some_ one move that person has to go back to the beginning. If one gets up to him he says "Creep Mouse". This can also be called Pussy behind the curtain. {Bobs and Excuses}- this game is for as many people you like, the more the better. It is like a game of touch but you have bobs and excuses. Bobs are just crouching down and excuses are 'I've hurt my leg'.You start off with 5 and you have to say 2 bobs and 3 excuses. If you are caught and you have run out of bobs and excuses you are ON.
